title: Education (CRE214)
description:
A Classic RISK! episode from our first two years! In the fourteenth episode of our second season, Michael Ian Black and Brown University faculty members Connie Crawford and Deak Nabers share stories of enlightenment.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Make a one-time donation to RISK! at PayPal.me/RISKshow

Get tickets to RISK! live shows at RISK-show.com/tour

Get the RISK! book at TheRISKBook.com

Take our storytelling classes at TheStoryStudio.org

Hire Kevin Allison to make a personalized video at Cameo.com/TheKevinAllison

Hire Kevin Allison as a coach at KevinAllison.com
author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Kevin allison, Michael Ian Black, Connie Crawford, Deak Nabers, Dan Rosen, Damscray, Wax Audio, Comfort Fit, Colin Meloy, G.G. Allin’s Dick, Pablo, Jeff Barr)
